steps.name: Intention
steps.instruction: Form the intention in your heart to perform wudu for prayer.

steps.name: Wash Hands
steps.instruction: Wash both hands up to the wrists three times. Start with the right hand.

steps.name: Rinse Mouth
steps.instruction: Take water into the mouth, swirl, and spit out. Three times.

steps.name: Clean Nose
steps.instruction: Sniff water into the nostrils then blow it out. Three times.

steps.name: Wash Face
steps.instruction: Wash the full face from hairline to chin and ear to ear. Three times.

steps.name: Wash Arms
steps.instruction: Wash right arm from fingertips to elbow three times, then left arm.

steps.name: Wipe Head
steps.instruction: With wet hands, wipe over the head from front to back and back to front once.

steps.name: Clean Ears
steps.instruction: With wet fingers wipe inside and behind the ears once.

steps.name: Wash Feet
steps.instruction: Wash right foot up to the ankle three times, including between toes, then left foot.
